channel.title: E! News on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in E! News on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘E! News’ Shutters, and a Celebrity Golden Era Comes to an End
item.description: “The Lindsay Lohan, Paris Hilton, Britney Spears era — it’s an untouchable time in entertainment news,” eulogizes longtime anchor Jason Kennedy.

item.title: ‘E! News’ Canceled After 32 Years on Air
item.description: “E! News” has been canceled — again. The celebrity-focused newscast will continue airing new episodes until Sept. 25 on E!, which is spinning off from NBCUniversal and will be folded into
